ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.filter_block: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets an entity.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.filter_entity: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets a block.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.lay_on_hands: Embrace your inner paladin! A context-sensitive blend of Touch and Self. Targets non-monster living entities by touch, or casts on self if unable to do so.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.reverse_direction: Reverses the direction of a block-targeted spell across the face struck.
